name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE COLLAB】hololive English -Council- and IRyS Special 3D Collab! #CouncilRyS3D [sEnjWtbnUj4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Hakos Baelz and the rest of the group exit the stage to prepare for the games.
Loading screen featuring the 'Promise' logo and 'Now Loading...' text.
The group gathers in a space-themed arena to introduce the 'Promise Games'.
IRyS and Baelz explain the rules and the three obstacles of the 'Red light, Green light' course.
Introduction of the special guest, A-chan, who will play the role of the 'Oni'.
The group prepares for the game, and A-chan starts the 'Red light, Green light' session.
